solution_line_template: Cary needs to save an additional ${shoe_cost} - ${already_saved} = $<<{shoe_cost}-{already_saved}={money_needed}>>{money_needed}.
It will take {money_needed} / {earnings_per_weekend} = <<{money_needed}/{earnings_per_weekend}={weekends_needed}>>{weekends_needed} more weekends to save enough money to afford the shoes.
